description: Try our easy to follow Garlic Prawns With Golden Pastries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Garlic Prawns With Golden Pastries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Melt butter in a large pan over mediumhigh heat. Add mushroom, leek and garlic and cook for 6 minutes, stirring often, or until softened. Add potato, carrot and stock and bring to the boil. Cover, reduce heat to medium and simmer for 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

Meanwhile, cut 4 x 12cm rounds from pastry and place onto tray. Brush with a little egg. Add spinach and prawns to vegetable mixture and stir well. Transfer to ovenproof dishes. Whisk cream and flour together in a bowl. Pour over prawn dishes.
Bake pastry and prawn dishes for 15 minutes or until pastry is crisp and golden. Serve with lemon wedges.
